DOC.brief_summary: To relieve pain patient symptomatic bullous keratopathy ( BK ) keratoplasty patient without visual prediction . The automated lamellar keratectomy represent alternative treatment pain symptomatic patient BK .
DOC.brief_title: Automated Lamellar Keratectomy Symptomatic Patients With Bullous Keratopathy
DOC.detailed_description: Only patient BK symptomatic ( pain ) submit automated lamellar keratectomy ( ALK ) . Complete ophthalmological examination include UCVA , BSVA , biomicroscopy , tonometry , esthesiometry , UBM pachymetry , impression cytology pain questionnaire perform preoperative , postoperative one , seven , 30 , 90 , 180 day one year .
